attributes.background:
If our democratic vote on Brexit is not upheld we will cease to pay any tax possible.
We refuse to pay into a dictatorship!!
The majority vote said LEAVE!!
We would rather be political prisoners than to fund a dictatorship!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like to ensure the UK leaves the EU, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224908

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
